model.yamlContent:
resource.software.rds.mysql_ansible:
  derived_from: "resource.software.rds"
  properties:
    resource_config:
      default: {}
  interfaces:
    cloudify.interfaces.lifecycle:
      create:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          repo_url:
            type: "string"
            description: "请指定Repo的下载路径"
            default: "https://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql80-community-release-el7-3.noarch.rpm"
            alias: "Repo下载路径"
          port:
            type: "string"
            description: "请指定MySQL数据库端口，默认为3306"
            default: "3306"
            alias: "MySQL端口"
          dbuser:
            type: "string"
            description: "请指定数据库默认用户名"
            default: "username"
            alias: "管理员用户"
          password:
            type: "password"
            description: "请指定数据库默认密码"
            default: "P@sswd123"
            alias: "管理员密码"
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "mysql_ansible_operations/mysql_install.yml"
        max_retries: 0
      refresh:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "mysql_ansible_operations/mysql_refresh.yml"
        max_retries: 0
      start:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "mysql_ansible_operations/mysql_start.yml"
        max_retries: 0
      stop:
        implementation: "sdx.resource_manager.operations.run_script"
        executor: "central_deployment_agent"
        inputs:
          script_type:
            type: "string"
            default: "ansible"
          script_path:
            type: "string"
            default: "mysql_ansible_operations/mysql_stop.yml"
        max_retries: 0

properties.description: 请指定MySQL数据库端口，默认为3306
请指定数据库默认用户名
请输入需要创建的数据库名称
